title: Persian 14
text: Abandon not the everlasting beauty for a beauty that must die, and set not your affections on this mortal world of dust.

prev.title: Persian 13
prev.text: I fear lest, bereft of the melody of the dove of heaven, ye will sink back to the shades of utter loss, and, never having gazed upon the beauty of the rose, return to water and clay.
